8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"Ashura was a day that the Quraish used to fast during Jahiliyyah, and the Messenger of Allah used to fast it. But when (the fast of) Ramadan became obligatory, the Ramadan was the required and Ashura was left. So whoever wanted to, he fasted it, and whoever wanted to, he left it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّخْصَةِ فِي تَرْكِ صَوْمِ يَوْمِ عَاشُورَاءَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Permission To Not Fast The Day Of Ashura
